Package Monitors.AuxiliaryClasses

Monitors.AuxiliaryClasses aggregates the different data structures used to facilitate the development of the Monitor classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bet
    The Bet class holds all the information regarding a Bet.
    HorseInPaddock
    The HorseInPaddock class holds all the necessary about a Horse that is/has been in the Paddock.
    HorsePos
    The HorsePos class holds all the necessary information about a Horse that's racing or that has finished a race.
    Parameters
    Class containing the Parameters of the HorseRace.
